Each night*, Riot chooses an alive good player (different to previous nights): a chosen Ravenkeeper uses their ability but does not die.
Each night*, Riot chooses an alive good player (different to previous nights): a chosen Sage uses their ability but does not die.
If Riot nominates and executes the Soldier, good wins.

rogue.name: Rogue
rogue.ability: You may choose to break any rules when alive. If the Storyteller finds out, even if dead, something bad might happen.

sage.name: Sage
sage.ability: If the Demon kills you, you learn that it is 1 of 2 players.
sage.otherNightReminder: If the Demon killed the Sage, wake the Sage and point to 2 players, 1 of which is the Demon.
sage.flavor: These mountainous tomes guard the secret, I am sure of it! Twixt word and word, it lies in wait. More candles, boy! More ink! These notes may look arcane, but the infernal puzzle is revealing itself.

sailor.name: Sailor
sailor.ability: Each night, choose an alive player: either you or they are drunk until dusk. You can't die.
sailor.firstNightReminder: The Sailor chooses a living player. :reminder:
sailor.otherNightReminder: The Sailor chooses a living player. :reminder:
sailor.flavor: I'll drink any one of yer under the table! You! The chatterbox! Reckon you can take me? No? Howza 'bout you, Grandma? You ever tried Old McKillys Extra Spiced Rum before? Guaranteed to put hairs on yer chest! Step aboard, aye!

saint.name: Saint
saint.ability: If you die by execution, your team loses.
saint.flavor: Wisdom begets peace. Patience begets wisdom. Fear not, for the time shall come when fear too shall pass. Let us pray, and may the unity of our vision make saints of us all.

savant.name: Savant
savant.ability: Each day, you may visit the Storyteller to learn 2 things in private: 1 is true & 1 is false.
savant.flavor: Seventy-two matchsticks on the floor... the sun sets early but the moon is unchanged... a torn piece of cloth... evil in the manor house... three by three... the one we trusted is not what he seems... green light means magnesium... residue, but the pattern is wrong... Seventy-two matchsticks on the floor...

scapegoat.name: Scapegoat
scapegoat.ability: If a player of your alignment is executed, you might be executed instead.
scapegoat.flavor: Good evening! Thank you for inviting me to the ball. I'm not from around here, but you sure seem like a friendly bunch, by golly. I'm sure we'll get along just dandy. What's all that rope for?

scarecrow.name: Scarecrow
scarecrow.ability: To good players, you register as a Demon & the Demon registers as a Minion.

scarletwoman.name: Scarlet Woman
scarletwoman.ability: If there are 5 or more players alive & the Demon dies, you become the Demon. (Travellers don't count.)
scarletwoman.otherNightReminder: If the Scarlet Woman became the Demon today, show them the *YOU ARE* token, then the Demon token.
scarletwoman.flavor: You have shown me the secrets of the Council of the Purple Flame. We have lain together in fire and in lust and in beastly commune, and I am forever your servant. But tonight, my dear, I am your master.

jinxes.reason: If there would be two Demons, one of which was the Scarlet Woman, the Scarlet Woman becomes the Scarlet Woman again.
If there would be two Demons, one of which was the Scarlet Woman, the Scarlet Woman remains the Scarlet Woman.

scavenger.name: Scavenger
scavenger.ability: If both your neighbors die, something good happens.

scholar.name: Scholar
scholar.ability: You start knowing which evil characters are in-play.
scholar.firstNightReminder: Show each of the evil tokens in play.

schoolmarm.name: Schoolmarm
schoolmarm.ability: Players who turn evil learn you are in play and may choose to remain good. [1 evil-creating character is in-play]
schoolmarm.firstNightReminder: If a player turned evil, wake them and inform them of the Schoolmarm and offer them to remain good.
schoolmarm.otherNightReminder: If a player turned evil, wake them and inform them of the Schoolmarm and offer them to remain good.

seamstress.name: Seamstress
seamstress.ability: Once per game, at night, choose 2 players (not yourself): you learn if they are the same alignment.
seamstress.firstNightReminder: The Seamstress might choose 2 players. Nod or shake your head. :reminder:
seamstress.otherNightReminder: The Seamstress might choose 2 players. Nod or shake your head. :reminder:
seamstress.flavor: Did you hear that stranger in the cashmere coat put the word on our young Belle? And she said yes? Well, that's nothing compared to what Harry and that juggler got up to at the fair! The things I could say if I was a tattletale... my, yes.

senator.name: Senator
senator.ability: Players can only nominate their living neighbors, even if you are dead.

sentinel.name: Sentinel
sentinel.ability: There might be 1 extra or 1 fewer Outsider in play.
sentinel.flavor: Name, please. Papers, please. Weapons, please.

shabaloth.name: Shabaloth
shabaloth.ability: Each night*, choose 2 players: they die. A dead player you chose last night might be regurgitated.
shabaloth.otherNightReminder: A previously chosen player might be resurrected. :reminder: The Shabaloth chooses 2 players. :reminder: :reminder:
shabaloth.flavor: Blarg f'taag nm mataan! No sho gumtha m'sik na yuuu. Fluuuuuuuuurg h-sikkkh.

shacklewight.name: Shacklewight
shacklewight.ability: Each night, choose any players: they all wake together. Tomorrow day, if 1 dies, they all die. Each day, if no-one dies, evil wins.
shacklewight.firstNightReminder: The Shacklewight chooses any players, mark them as 'chosen'. Wake all marked players at the same time.
shacklewight.otherNightReminder: The Shacklewight chooses any players, mark them as 'chosen'. Wake all marked players at the same time.

shugenja.name: Shugenja
shugenja.ability: You start knowing if your closest evil player is clockwise or anti-clockwise. If equidistant, this info is arbitrary.
shugenja.firstNightReminder: Point clockwise or anticlockwise around the circle.
shugenja.flavor: これは夢。それも夢。すべて夢です。

sicilian.name: Sicilian
sicilian.ability: When nominations are called, if you publicly choose a player (not yourself) & they are not executed today, their team wins.

sissaphyth.name: Sissaphyth
sissaphyth.ability: At night, if all Minions are dead, choose a Demon: become it, acting twice each night.
sissaphyth.firstNightReminder: If all minions are dead, let the Sissaphyth choose a demon to become.
sissaphyth.otherNightReminder: If all minions are dead, let the Sissaphyth choose a demon to become.

slayer.name: Slayer
slayer.ability: Once per game, during the day, publicly choose a player: if they are the Demon, they die.

snakecharmer.name: Snake Charmer
snakecharmer.ability: Each night, choose an alive player: a chosen Demon swaps characters & alignments with you & is then poisoned.
snakecharmer.firstNightReminder: The Snake Charmer chooses a player. If they chose the Demon: Show the *YOU ARE* & Demon tokens. Give a thumbs down. Swap the Snake Charmer & Demon tokens. Put the old Snake Charmer to sleep. Wake the old Demon. Show the *YOU ARE* and Snake Charmer tokens & give a thumbs up. :reminder:
snakecharmer.otherNightReminder: The Snake Charmer chooses a player. If they chose the Demon: Show the *YOU ARE* & Demon tokens. Give a thumbs down. Swap the Snake Charmer & Demon tokens. Put the old Snake Charmer to sleep. Wake the old Demon. Show the *YOU ARE* and Snake Charmer tokens & give a thumbs up. :reminder:
snakecharmer.flavor: Effendi... I am but a humble man, but my pipe is golden and a single tune will tame the wildest djinn, Inshallah. They say that greed hangs more men than rope. But not I, Effendi... not I.

snitch.name: Snitch
snitch.firstNightReminder: Wake each Minion. Show the *THESE CHARACTERS ARE NOT IN PLAY* token and three not-in-play character tokens. Put each Minion to sleep.

soldier.name: Soldier
soldier.ability: You are safe from the Demon.
soldier.flavor: As David said to Goliath, as Theseus said to the Minotaur, as Arjuna said to Bhagadatta... No.

soulhammer.name: Soul Hammer
soulhammer.ability: Each night*, choose a player: they die. After the final night, the dead may not talk to the living.

spiritofivory.name: Spirit of Ivory
spiritofivory.ability: There can't be more than 1 extra evil player.
spiritofivory.flavor: The Wasteland calls. Bones rise to flesh, then fall to dust. The great spirit grows. The great spirit watches. The great spirit guides. The human listens, or the human is no more.

spy.name: Spy
spy.ability: Each night, you see the Grimoire. You might register as good & as a Townsfolk or Outsider, even if dead.
spy.firstNightReminder: Show the Grimoire for as long as the Spy needs.
spy.otherNightReminder: Show the Grimoire for as long as the Spy needs.
spy.flavor: Any brewmaster worth their liquor, knows no concoction pours trouble quicker, than one where spies seem double.

jinxes.reason: If the Spy is (or has been) in play, the Damsel is poisoned.
The Spy registers as evil to the Ogre.
If the Poppy Grower has their ability, the Spy does not see the Grimoire.

stableboy.name: Stableboy
stableboy.firstNightReminder: Show the Stableboy the token of one in play character.
stableboy.otherNightReminder: Show the Stableboy the token of one different in play character.

steward.name: Steward
steward.firstNightReminder: Point to the good player marked *KNOW*.
steward.flavor: How DARE you accuse Her Ladyship of wrongdoing? I’ve known her my entire life! All nine years!

stormcatcher.name: Storm Catcher
stormcatcher.ability: Name a good character. If in play, they can only die by execution, but evil players learn which player it is.
stormcatcher.firstNightReminder: At the start of the night, announce which character is stormcaught. If that character is in play, mark that player as *STORMCAUGHT*. :reminder: Wake each evil player and show them the character token, then the marked player.  If not in play, wake each evil player, show them the *THESE CHARACTERS ARE NOT IN PLAY* token and the relevant character token.
stormcatcher.flavor: At dawn, the temple’s long shadow creeps to the fountain. At dusk, the obelisk blocks the red glare, cooling warm water under the archway. All lines converge here. A storm is coming, and this, this pebbled and lush and holy place between the apple trees, is the eye.

shrouds.title: The stormcaught role is not in play
This player has the stormcaught role

strongman.name: Strongman
strongman.ability: If you were the most mad about being the Strongman today & a player chose you tonight for any reason, they die.

summoner.name: Summoner
summoner.ability: You get 3 bluffs. On the 3rd night, choose a player: they become an evil Demon of your choice. [No Demon]
summoner.firstNightReminder: Show the *THESE CHARACTERS ARE NOT IN PLAY* token. Show 3 not-in-play good character tokens.
summoner.otherNightReminder: Change the Summoner reminder token to the relevant night. If it is night 3, the Summoner chooses a player and a Demon. Put the Summoner to sleep. Wake the chosen player. Show the *YOU ARE* token, a thumbs down and the chosen Demon token.
summoner.flavor: Hail the guardians of the north; by my intellect, thou art cut. Hail the guardians of the east; by my will, thou art dominated. Hail the guardians of the south; by that which lies beyond, the mystery is revealed. Hail the guardians of the west; a shield in the darkness

jinxes.reason: The Summoner registers as the Demon to the Clockmaker.
If the living Summoner has no ability, the Storyteller has the Summoner ability.
If the living Summoner is removed from play, the Storyteller has the Summoner ability.
If the Summoner creates a second living Demon, deaths tonight are arbitrary.
If the Summoner creates a second living Demon, deaths tonight are arbitrary.
If a Lord of Typhon is summoned, they must neighbor a Minion & their other neighbor becomes an evil Minion.
If the Summoner creates a second living Demon, deaths tonight are arbitrary.
If the Poppy Grower is alive on the 3rd night, the Summoner chooses which Demon but not which player.
If the living Summoner has no ability, the Storyteller has the Summoner ability.
The Summoner may summon a Pukka on the 2nd night instead of the 3rd.
If the Summoner summons a dead player into the Zombuul, the Zombuul has already "died once".

sweetheart.name: Sweetheart
sweetheart.ability: When you die, 1 player is drunk from now on.
sweetheart.otherNightReminder: If the Sweetheart died, a player became drunk immediately. If you haven't done this yet, do so now. :reminder:
sweetheart.flavor: I will never forget her. Never.

tealady.name: Tea Lady
tealady.ability: If both your alive neighbors are good, they can't die.
tealady.flavor: If you are cold, tea will warm you. If you are too heated, tea will cool you. If you are depressed, tea will cheer you. If you are excited, tea will calm you.

thespian.name: Thespian
thespian.ability: Each day, an evil player must be 'mad' about something or they die. Each day, you must be 'mad' about something or you die.

thief.name: Thief
thief.ability: Each night, choose a player (not yourself): their vote counts negatively tomorrow.
thief.flavor: I ain't done nuffink. I weren't even in dat alley last night! It weren't me what stole Mayor Bruno's briefcase wiv all dem fancy dockoments innit. Besides, it was too 'eavy to carry far.

tinker.name: Tinker
tinker.ability: You might die at any time.
tinker.flavor: I think I see the problem. Luckily, I have an idea! This catapult will shoot twice as far with just a minor adjustment...

tipitipi.name: Tipi-Tipi
tipitipi.ability: Each night*, a player dies. On the final night, choose a player. They are 'mad' that you are not the demon or their team loses.
tipitipi.otherNightReminder: The Tipi-Tipi chooses a player, If this is the final night they are mad, otherwise they die.

tor.name: Tor
tor.otherNightReminder: If a player died tonight, show the *YOU ARE* info token, their character token, & a thumbs up or thumbs down.
tor.ability: Players don't know their character or alignment. They learn them when they die.
tor.flavor: With thunder as my voice and lightning as my blade, I, the eternal guardian, feast upon the fools who dare approach the forbidden gate. Behold, my sacred goal! To purge the beetle from the belly of the rocky earth, to ensnare it in a net of stars, on the hilltop where heaven meets earth.

towncrier.name: Town Crier
towncrier.ability: Each night*, you learn if a Minion nominated today.
towncrier.otherNightReminder: Either nod or shake your head.
towncrier.flavor: Hear ye! Hear ye! Witchcraft in the labyrinth! Genius savant reveals all! Town in danger! Hear Ye!

shrouds.title: Did You Nominate Today?

toymaker.name: Toymaker
toymaker.ability: The Demon may choose not to attack & must do this at least once per game. Evil players get normal starting info.
toymaker.firstNightReminder: Resolve the Minion Info and Demon Info steps even though there are fewer than 7 players.
toymaker.otherNightReminder: If it is a night when a Demon attack could end the game, and the Demon is marked *FINAL NIGHT: NO ATTACK*, then the Demon does not act tonight. (Do not wake them.)
toymaker.flavor: It buzzes! It walks down stairs! It keeps you warm at night! It tastes like sugar! The kiddies love it! Introducing... the brand new... Warm'o-buzzy-wuzzy-walk'a'bot-thingy-contraption! Fun for all ages!

tramp.name: Tramp
tramp.ability: If there are any votes to execute you, you might be executed immediately.

tycoon.name: Tycoon
tycoon.ability: 1 player that you have shaken hands with might be drunk. Each night*, learn if you shook hands with an evil player today.

undertaker.name: Undertaker
undertaker.ability: Each night*, you learn which character died by execution today.
undertaker.otherNightReminder: If a player was executed today, show their character token.
undertaker.flavor: Hmmm....what have we here? The left boot is worn down to the heel, with flint shavings under the tongue. This is the garb of a Military man.

vatdweller.name: Vat Dweller
vatdweller.ability: On your 1st night, choose an Outsider. Every Outsider is a copy of that Outsider. [-? to +? Outsiders]

vigormortis.name: Vigormortis
vigormortis.ability: Each night*, choose a player: they die. Minions you kill keep their ability & poison 1 Townsfolk neighbor. [-1 Outsider]
vigormortis.otherNightReminder: The Vigormortis chooses a player. :reminder: If that player is a Minion, poison a neighboring Townsfolk. :reminder: :reminder:
vigormortis.flavor: All doors are one door. All keys are one key. All cups are one cup, but whosoever drinketh of the water that I give shall never thirst, but the water shall be in him a well springing up into everlasting life.

villageidiot.name: Village Idiot
villageidiot.ability: Each night, choose a player: you learn their alignment. [+0 to +2 Village Idiots. 1 of the extras is drunk]
villageidiot.firstNightReminder: Choose a Village Idiot to be drunk. Wake the Village Idiots one at a time, they choose a player, show either good or evil thumbs according to the alignment of that player.
villageidiot.otherNightReminder: Wake the Village Idiots one at a time, they choose a player, show either good or evil thumbs according to the alignment of that player.
villageidiot.flavor: Roses are blue, and violets are red, Please reverse what I just said.

virgin.name: Virgin
virgin.ability: The 1st time you are nominated, if the nominator is a Townsfolk, they are executed immediately.
virgin.flavor: I am pure. Let those who are without sin cast themselves down and suffer in my stead. My reputation shall not be stained with your venomous accusations.

virilus.name: Virilus
virilus.ability: Each night, choose a player to infect. Infected who nominate die & infect the nominee. After day 4, evil wins.
virilus.firstNightReminder: The Virilus chooses a player, mark them with 'chosen'.
virilus.otherNightReminder: The Virilus chooses a player, mark them with 'chosen'.

vizier.name: Vizier
vizier.ability: All players know you are the Vizier. You cannot die during the day. If good voted, you may choose to execute immediately.
vizier.firstNightReminder: Announce the Vizier player to the group.
vizier.flavor: An excellent decision, as always, sire. Such a petty crime as bumping into the Bishop indeed deserves your ‘justice’ and ‘mercy’. Take a stroll in the gardens. Visit the gallery and peruse the sculptures of Von Strauf. Relax, sire. Leave everything… to me.

jinxes.reason: The Storyteller doesn't declare the Vizier is in play.
If the Vizier loses their ability, they learn this, and cannot die during the day.
The Vizier wakes with the Fearmonger, learns who they choose and cannot choose to immediately execute that player.
The Storyteller doesn't declare the Vizier is in play.
The Politician might register as evil to the Vizier.
If the Vizier loses their ability, they learn this, and cannot die during the day.
The Zealot might register as evil to the Vizier.

vortox.name: Vortox
vortox.ability: Each night*, choose a player: they die. Townsfolk abilities yield false info. Each day, if no-one is executed, evil wins.
vortox.flavor: Black is White. Right is Wrong. Left is Right. Up is Long. Down is Sight. Short is Blind. Follow me. Answers find.

jinxes.reason: If the Vortox kills the Banshee, all players learn that the Banshee has died.

voudon.name: Voudon
voudon.ability: Only you & the dead can vote. They don't need a vote token to do so. A 50% majority isn't required.
voudon.flavor: Bien venu. Sit down. Breathe deep. Enter the land of the dead. See with their eyes. Speak with their voice. Yon sel lang se janm ase.

voyeur.name: Voyeur
voyeur.ability: Each night*, choose a player (not yourself): if they die tonight, all players learn who you are.
voyeur.otherNightReminder: The Voyeur choses a player, mark them with the 'chosen' token.

washerwoman.name: Washerwoman
washerwoman.ability: You start knowing that 1 of 2 players is a particular Townsfolk.
washerwoman.firstNightReminder: Show the Townsfolk character token. Point to both the *TOWNSFOLK* and *WRONG* players.
washerwoman.flavor: Bloodstains on a dinner jacket? No, this is cooking sherry. How careless.

wench.name: Wench
wench.ability: Each night, you learn a player. They are drunk until dusk and any information they receive is false.
wench.firstNightReminder: Mark a player as 'drunk' and show the Wench the drunk player.
wench.otherNightReminder: Mark a player as 'drunk' and show the Wench the drunk player.

widow.name: Widow
widow.ability: On your 1st night, look at the Grimoire & choose a player: they are poisoned. 1 good player knows a Widow is in play.
widow.firstNightReminder: Show the Grimoire for as long as the Widow needs. The Widow chooses a player. :reminder:
widow.flavor: More wine? Château d’Ergot ’07 is a very special vintage. My yes, very special indeed.

shrouds.title: There Is A Widow In Play.
shrouds.epilog: Send not to know for whom the Widow calls; it calls for thee.

jinxes.reason: If the Widow is (or has been) in play, the Damsel is poisoned.
If the Poppy Grower has their ability, the Widow does not see the Grimoire.

witch.name: Witch
witch.ability: Each night, choose a player: if they nominate tomorrow, they die. If just 3 players live, you lose this ability.
witch.flavor: Three drops of goat's blood. A lock of hair, torn in anger. The name is spoken, the shadow cast. Walk left foot first down that brambled path, and don't look back.

witchhunter.name: Witch Hunter
witchhunter.ability: Each night, choose a player: you learn their alignment. If they are not executed tomorrow, they turn evil. You can not be evil.
witchhunter.firstNightReminder: The Witch Hunter points to a player. Show thumbs or down to show the Witch Hunter their alignment. Mark the player as 'chosen'.
witchhunter.otherNightReminder: If the player marked as chosen was not executed, their alignment becomes Evil. The Witch Hunter points to a player. Show thumbs or down to show the Witch Hunter their alignment. Mark the player as 'chosen'.

wizard.name: Wizard
wizard.ability: Once per game, choose to make a wish. If granted, it might have a price & leave a clue as to its nature.
wizard.firstNightReminder: Run the Wizard's ability, if applicable.
wizard.otherNightReminder: Run the Wizard's ability, if applicable.
wizard.flavor: Every man and every woman is a star. Love is the law, love under will.

wraith.name: Wraith
wraith.ability: You may choose to open your eyes at night. You wake when other evil players do.
wraith.firstNightReminder: Wake the Wraith whenever other evil players wake.
wraith.otherNightReminder: Wake the Wraith whenever other evil players wake.
wraith.flavor: Ra'āb ina pān ṣilli ša dāri. Rigim qallu ina šūri, šītu ša šunātīka iredde, u napšutka idlul ina pān maṣṣartī dāriti.

xaan.name: Xaan
xaan.ability: On night X, all Townsfolk are poisoned until dusk. [X Outsiders]
xaan.firstNightReminder: Mark the Xaan with the *NIGHT 1* reminder. If X is 1, mark the Xaan with the *X* reminder token. :reminder: :reminder:
xaan.otherNightReminder: Change the Xaan reminder token to the relevant night. If it is night X, mark the Xaan with the *X* reminder token. :reminder: :reminder:
xaan.flavor: Down they fall. One by one. By two, by three, by five.

yaggababble.name: Yaggababble
yaggababble.ability: You start knowing a secret phrase. For each time you said it publicly today, a player might die.
yaggababble.firstNightReminder: Choose a secret phrase. Wake the Yaggababble and let them know their secret phrase.
yaggababble.otherNightReminder: For each time the Yaggababble said the phrase today, you may choose a player. They die. :reminder:
yaggababble.flavor: Murders inside the Rue Morgue? Фальшивые новости! Hounds on the Baskerville moor? Фальшивые новости! Death while sailing the Nile? Фальшивые новости!

shrouds.title:
Your Phrase Is:
"Something"

jinxes.reason: If the Exorcist chooses the Yaggababble, the Yaggababble does not kill tonight.

zealot.name: Zealot
zealot.ability: If there are 5 or more players alive, you must vote for every nomination.
zealot.flavor: I enjoy talking to you. Your mind appeals to me. It resembles my own mind except that you happen to be insane.

zenomancer.name: Zenomancer
zenomancer.ability: One or more players each have a goal. When achieved, that player learns a piece of true info.
zenomancer.flavor: The universe is a verb not a noun, they say, and it is turtles, turtles all the way down. Turtles all the way down, my friend, turtles all the way down.

shrouds.title:
You have been tasked with the following:
"Task"
shrouds.epilog: What is your name? What is your quest? What is... uh...

zodion.name: Zodion
zodion.ability: You start knowing all not-in-play characters. Each night*, the highest character on the script dies.
zodion.firstNightReminder: Show the Zodion all not in play characters.

zombuul.name: Zombuul
zombuul.ability: Each night*, if no-one died today, choose a player: they die. The 1st time you die, you live but register as dead.
zombuul.otherNightReminder: If no one died today, the Zombuul chooses a player. :reminder:
zombuul.flavor: I do not. Understand. Your ways. Fellow human. Show me. The dirt. Where the holy. Lay. Sleeping. I too. Must sleep. Soon.
